title: v2.3.0 is ready
content:
Features:
  - Text tool
  - Contour brush

Enhancements:
  - Hold the preview button to zoom 100% on the canvas
  - Relocate color replace, color adjustment, and outline tool to a new button in the toolbar

Fixes:
  - Shading not registering colors after closing and re-opening
  - Move tool artifact
  - Black screen and cannot use the app for a few users
